FuncDef: This command configures downstream IPv6 fragmentation behavior in DS-lite and NAT64. IPv6 fragmentation is performed in the ISA. IPv4 fragmentation is not affected by this command. If desired, downstream IPv4 packet can be fragmented in the carrier IOM before the packet reaches ISA (and the NAT function). The IPv4 fragmentation in the downstream direction can be set by theconfig>router/vprn>nat>outside>mtucommand

ParaDef.Info: IPv6 Fragmentation is disabled. In case that the packet size is larger.
IPv6 fragmentation will be performed in all cases, regardless of the DF bit setting in the tunneled/translated IPv4 packet.
IPv6 Fragmentation will be performed only in cases when DF bit in tunneled/translated IPv4 packet is cleared.
